price: Wͻfaa Yε nsεnkyerεnee no nyinaa atorᴐsԑm. Enti Yεde Otumfoͻ a Ɔtumi ade nyinaa yε no Tumi no pari sͻͻ wͻn mu dendeenden.
arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kadhabū biāyātinā kullihā fa-akhadhnāhum akhdha ʿazīzin muq'tadirin
